name: Cruiseair Aviation, Inc.
about: Cruiseair Aviation, Inc. is a family-owned business with a rich history spanning over 50 years, specializing in aircraft maintenance, repair, and upgrades, particularly for Beechcraft models in the South-Western US. Located in Ramona, California, our facility at KRNM offers comprehensive flight training programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, and Flight Instructor certifications. With a commitment to discriminating service, we provide top-notch maintenance and training, ensuring the highest standards of safety and excellence. Our dedicated team is here to support your aviation needs with professionalism and integrity.
